post.body: It's on now? HBO?
Holy shit! Wait til I tell Lil!
Is that an echidna?
Why is she selling it? I thought she loved it.
Big dog? Hahahaha.
Poor chick.
WTF? another kid? You a goooooood person.
From Hell is a brilliant book.
I feels ya. I have two more stories I have to read tonight. Going blind.
I assume you checked Best Buy. They had boatloads of them at the beginning of the month.
what happened?
You don't bomb from a cannon, do you?
I'm okat, thanks. I'll be better when I get to the bank!
Incredibly cute!
You'll be back doing that before you know it.
hahahaha. Everyone suffers in the holidays.
I think I can stop some of the transactions. They're preauthorized.
S'up? All antsy and shit?
My Xmas present is a drunk feral chick. Wait, that sounds wrong ...
Thinking about tuna for dinner
Satan's dog http://twitpic.com/tr7g
Good news: great nap. Bad news: changing cat litter.
Short nap, but a good one.
Naps make the world better.
All semester, this kid has done nothing but write about pot smoking. WTF? Stoners are so tedious.
Ben is amazing.
Story quote: War and drugs cause death to people.
A story from the POV of the host if Survivor. It's as bad as it sounds.
Boy unknowingly tears up winning lottery ticket. Girl meets mysterious stranger on train. Papi prays for death.
Kingman. Shit, still in Kingman.
Merry Xmas to all.
I fucking love the original Willy Wonka. Gene Wilder is evil genius, and the movie is genuinely surreal.
All is mostly well. Cards cancelled. Money returned in a week or so. Stupid crooks.
Looks like they got into my joint account, too.
Fuck! Someone hacked my checking account! The withdrawals are in Texas!
I'm filled with internet rage. Why are some ecommerce sites such crap?
Not after today!
Spent all day with an 8 year old boy. Holy crap, how do parents do this?
Watching TV on my iMac via EyeTV. Very cool.
Any one want a set of silver Creature speakers? $70. http://tinyurl.com/a7w663
